lead_paragraph: An article on Aug. 11 previewing the men’s World Cup soccer qualifying match on Aug. 12 between the United States and Mexico misstated the Americans’ record at Estadio Azteca. The United States team was 0-8-1 at the stadium entering the game — not 0-18-1, which was its overall record in Mexico City. (After losing by 2-1, the United States fell to 0-9-1 at Azteca and 0-19-1 in Mexico City.).
